infos.value: Thank you. We would never have taken the fortress if not for you.
We proceed with the plan at dawn. You can fulfill your side of the bargain then.
Oh, Viktora already told you? Then we needn't say more.
We'll go ahead and make our way back to the hideout.
We shall return as well—to Wezette Castle.
So the rebellion begins at dawn's first light...
Viktora will persuade Glaciela that it is better to hold off for now.
So where does that leave us...?
We must rescue Machérie and unite with Hourne as allies.
Are we to return to Wezette after all that...?
Ah. No, we must first persuade Father, of course.
...There are worse ways to proceed. Besides, we all could use a break from the bloodshed.
Daylight has already left us. Let us hurry to Wezette Castle.
